title: [Health] Suicidal behaviors, particularly suicide attempts, are high among medical students in Africa. Findings based on a systematic review and meta-analysis of suicidal behaviors among medical students in Africa.

[Health] Top IUD TikTok Videos Often Portray Painful Experiences, Healthcare Mistrust. Of the videos analyzed, 37.8% had a negative tone, 19.4% had a positive tone; 27.6% mentioned a distrust of healthcare professionals, and 24.4% contained moderately or highly inaccurate scientific claims
